data.title: Blake Lively and Penn Badgley split
data.meta_description: It’s off! After weeks of rumours, the pair have finally confirmed the end of their three-year relationship
data.text:
It’s off! After weeks of rumours, the pair have finally confirmed the end of their three-year relationship

After weeks of speculation their romance was on the rocks, Gossip Girl pair Blake lively and Penn Badley have gone their separate ways, confirming their split via a rep.

SEE ALL THE LATEST GOSSIP GIRL PICTURES HERE!

Blake and Penn’s break-up follows in the footsteps of their onscreen personas, sexy Serena van der Woodsen and Dan Humphrey, who also ended their romance during the US hit show.

They first met at the tender age of 12, but it definitely wasn’t love at first sight, as they didn’t get on in the beginning.

The sparks didn’t fly until they reunited on the set of Gossip Girl in 2007 and went public with their romance a year later, earning themselves a place as one of the hottest Hollywood couples around.

'We didn't like each other at all then...but we've become very close,' Blake said of her beau last year.

'It's mad when we go out - it feels like being Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes. We didn't set out to be a celebrity couple, but when you work opposite someone you develop chemistry.'

But even though a rep for the pair has confirmed to Us Weekly they have split, it’s thought they’ll stay friends.

'They're professionals,' one insider revealed. 'They're still good friends and hang out on the set.

SEE ALL THE LATEST GOSSIP GIRL PICTURES HERE!

CELEBRITY SPLITS 2010
